Bretonnia
Kingdom of Bretonnia
Bretonnian
Louen Leoncoeur
Blessing of the Lady
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to other civilizations provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture for Bretonnia. Other civilizations' [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to Bretonnia provide +2 [ICON_Food] Food for them and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Bretonnia. Opposing civilizations receive double the war weariness for fighting against Bretonnia.

One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government.

Imperial

Empire of Sigmar

Malekith
Druchii

Tundra terrain gives food as Grasslands to other Civilizations.

Finubar
Asur

Units gain the ability to enter Ocean tiles after researching the Shipbuilding technology. Naval melee units heal in neutral territory. Units do not receive damage from Blizzards.

Grail Chapel
Bretonnia unique improvement that can be build on Plains and Grasslands. +1[ICON_Faith] Faith and +1[ICON_Faith] Faith for being next to a river. If next to a lake +1[ICON_Faith] Faith and +1[ICON_Culture] Culture.
Waystones
High Elves and Wood Elves unique improvement that can be build on Plains and Grasslands. Gives +1[ICON_Culture] Culture. +1[ICON_Faith] Faith for being next to a forest. +1[ICON_Science] Science for being next to a Coast.
Ziggurat of the Old Ones
Lizardmen unique improvement. +1[ICON_Faith] Faith. +1[ICON_Faith] Faith and +1[ICON_Culture] Culture for being next to a Jungle. +1[ICON_Science] Science for being adjacent to a river. Occupying unit receives +4[ICON_Strength] Defense Strength and automatically gains 2 turns of fortification.
Idolz
Greenskins unique improvement. Gives +1[ICON_Faith] Faith. +2[ICON_Faith] Faith for being next to a Holy Site. +2[ICON_Culture] Culture for being next to a Encampment. +2[ICON_Production] Production for being next to a Industrial Zone.
Smugglers' Cove
Vampire Coast unique improvement that can only be built on hills next to Coast. Gives +2[ICON_Gold] Gold and +1[ICON_Culture] Culture. +2[ICON_Culture] Culture for being next to a Harbor.
Cave Painting
Ogres unique improvement. Gives +1[ICON_Faith] Faith and +1[ICON_Culture] Culture. +2[ICON_Faith] Faith for being next to a Holy Site.
Reiksfort
A district in your city for military facilities. +2 Great Point for Generals. Trade routes passing through give Culture too. Bonus of Production for being next to a Forest.

Wood Elf unique District that replace the Holy Site district. +2 Great Prophet. Double Faith bonus for being adjacent to Forests.
Nest-Lair
A district in your city for military facilities. +2 Great Point for Generals. +1 Housing and more production for trade routes passing through.
Mausoleum
A district in your city for military facilities. +1 Great Point for Generals. If next to a Holy Site gains +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith.
Warband Camp
A district in your city for military facilities. +2 Great Point for Generals. If next to a Tundra, Snow or Desert Mountain gains +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Necropolis
Unique District that replace the Holy Site district. +2 Great Prophet and +1 for Great Generals. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1[ICON_FAITH] Faith for being adjacent to a Wonder.
